description.value:
You recite an ancient poem to calm the minds of those around you. In addition to the normal effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-lifeblade.lifeblade.Item.nyK2deCUwuApBTci]{Spirit Trance Resolve}, each affected ally may lower their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition by 1 at the start of their turn. If an ally has multiple applicable conditions, they choose which condition to lower.

Heightened (3rd) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} to the list of conditions.

Heightened (5th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} to the list of conditions.
